fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Offer sarcastic comments to one player,  roleblocking them.
- Do an eye roll at an argument, once you do this, the host MUST show why the argument is flawed, if at all. They may reveal information leaked in private channels in order to do so(Day ability)
- Serve somebody piping hot coffee, burning them, setting their defense to fragile and attacking them with a basic attack.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You serve everybody who visits you piping hot coffee.
- You may not be roleblocked
- You may never multitask, even if another ability says you can.
